tool_description: This Api Gets All Information From "amazon.in"
name: Amazon India Scraper_v3
title: Amazon India Scraper

api_list.name: Product Reviews
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://amazon-india-scraper1.p.rapidapi.com/getproducts/B098XK9BPC/ShowRev"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "amazon-india-scraper1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://amazon-india-scraper1.p.rapidapi.com/getproducts/{is_id}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "amazon-india-scraper1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }
